Sentencas: The need for clean and efficient energy conversion systems has stimulated tremendous research activities in the area of energy systems.
Titulo: P-Substituted Ba0.95La0.05FeO3-δ as a Cathode Material for SOFCs

Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells stand out because of their high efficiency and low emissions.
Titulo: P-Substituted Ba0.95La0.05FeO3-δ as a Cathode Material for SOFCs

Sentencas: In spite of the promise, to commercialize solid oxide fuel cells, the operating temperature needs to be reduced below 800 degrees C.
Titulo: P-Substituted Ba0.95La0.05FeO3-δ as a Cathode Material for SOFCs

Sentencas: Unfortunately, at such low temperatures the oxygen reduction reactions taking place at the cathode side of the solid oxide fuel cells are typically sluggish.
Titulo: P-Substituted Ba0.95La0.05FeO3-δ as a Cathode Material for SOFCs

Sentencas: Ferrites have recently shown that they can overcome this challenge.
Titulo: P-Substituted Ba0.95La0.05FeO3-δ as a Cathode Material for SOFCs

Sentencas: However, the conductivity of these materials is typically low.
Titulo: P-Substituted Ba0.95La0.05FeO3-δ as a Cathode Material for SOFCs

Sentencas: Here, we show by density functional theory calculations that substituting Fe in Ba1-xLaxFeO3-delta with P lowers both the O vacancy formation and vacancy migration energies and promotes the creation of PO4 groups.
Titulo: P-Substituted Ba0.95La0.05FeO3-δ as a Cathode Material for SOFCs

Sentencas: These factors contribute to improving the diffusional properties and oxygen reduction reaction performance.
Titulo: P-Substituted Ba0.95La0.05FeO3-δ as a Cathode Material for SOFCs

Sentencas: We further successfully introduce P in the Fe-site of Ba0.95La0.05FeO3-delta to make a novel cathode material, Ba0.95La0.05Fe0.95P0.05O3-delta.
Titulo: P-Substituted Ba0.95La0.05FeO3-δ as a Cathode Material for SOFCs

Sentencas: Consistently, we observe that Ba0.95La0.05Fe0.95P0.05O3-delta has higher electrical conductivity and better electrocatalytic activity compared to Ba0.95La0.05FeO3-delta.
Titulo: P-Substituted Ba0.95La0.05FeO3-δ as a Cathode Material for SOFCs

Sentencas: In light of these results, we suggest that nonmetal element doping is an effective strategy for the design of new ferrites.
Titulo: P-Substituted Ba0.95La0.05FeO3-δ as a Cathode Material for SOFCs
